title: 有没有办法通过命令实现有技能的剑？
author: 大天天
txt_content:
在原版中，有没有办法通过命令方块实现有技能的一把钻石剑。（不是自定义附魔）详细：
剑一定要在被重命名为神剑之后才有这些技能；在手持这把剑时玩家会给玩家饱和、生命恢复、抗性提升、伤害吸收等buff（200级），并且增加10000点护甲,（最好是全部金色加红边，比这张图等级还高，注：这个是1个mod实现的，为了折叠显示护甲值、生命值加的，是补丁类mod）99999点生命值（是红心，不是黄心最好比这张图等级还要高）
；在攻击敌人后会使他具有瞬间伤害，凋零，缓慢的debuff（最好是5级），10秒之后会在他所在的地方产生无视护甲造成1000点伤害的爆炸。（这些技能最好有酷炫的粒子效果）

replies.txt_content:

大天天 发表于 2019-11-2 15:38
谢谢！请问1.12指的是1.12,1.12.1还是1.12.2
1.12，1.12.1，1.12.2均可

获取武器：
give @p diamond_sword 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",Name:"generic.attackDamage",Slot:"mainhand",Operation:0,Amount:7d,UUIDMost:1,UUIDLeast:1},{AttributeName:"generic.attackSpeed",Name:"generic.attackSpeed",Slot:"mainhand",Operation:0,Amount:-2.4d,UUIDMost:1,UUIDLeast:1},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"generic.armor",Slot:"mainhand",Operation:0,Amount:10000d,UUIDMost:1,UUIDLeast:1},{AttributeName:"generic.maxHealth",Name:"generic.maxHealth",Slot:"mainhand",Operation:0,Amount:99999d,UUIDMost:1,UUIDLeast:1}],display:{Name:"神剑"},shenjian:1b}复制代码

建立计分板：
scoreboard objectives add hurt stat.damageDealt
scoreboard objextives add timer dummy复制代码

以下命令循环执行
scoreboard players tag @a[tag=shenjian] remove shenjian
scoreboard players tag @a add shenjian {SelectedItem:{tag:{shenjian:1b}}}

execute @a ~ ~ ~ particle fireworksSpark ~ ~1 ~ 0.3 0.6 0.3 0.1 3

effect @a[tag=shenjian] saturation 1 199 true
effect @a[tag=shenjian] regeneration 1 199 true
effect @a[tag=shenjian] resistance 1 199 true
effect @a[tag=shenjian] absorption 1 199 true

execute @a[tag=shenjian,score_hurt_min=1] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @e[r=5,rm=0.1] add hurt {HurtTime:9s}
execute @a[tag=shenjian,score_hurt_min=1] ~ ~ ~ effect @e[r=5,tag=hurt] instant_damage 1 4
execute @a[tag=shenjian,score_hurt_min=1] ~ ~ ~ effect @e[r=5,tag=hurt] wither 10 4
execute @a[tag=shenjian,score_hurt_min=1] ~ ~ ~ effect @e[r=5,tag=hurt] slowness 10 4

execute @a[tag=shenjian,score_hurt_min=1] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players set @e[r=5,rm=0.1,tag=hurt] timer 200
scoreboard players remove @e[score_timer_min=1] timer 1
execute @e[score_timer=0] ~ ~ ~ summon arrow ~ ~2.5 ~ {Motion:[0d,-10d,0d],damage:1000d}
execute @e[score_timer=0] ~ ~ ~ particle largeexplode ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1 0.1 10
execute @e[score_timer=0] ~ ~ ~ particle explode ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0.5 100
scoreboard players reset @e[score_timer=0] timer


scoreboard players reset @a[score_hurt_min=1] hurt复制代码


最终效果
算了，gif总是炸
